attributes.action: election manifesto's to be made legally binding
attributes.additional_details: Time after time at every election we get all these empty promises and rhetoric from politicians, where they promise us the world only to forget about them once they are elected. It is time that they were made to stand by their pledges and be honest with the people who vote for them, not only would it make sure that politicians told the truth but people would be made aware of just what/who they were voting for
